change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Audio recordings of music and moving images
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English and Spanish

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Film, video, and audio recordings of music, including long time Vice President and Legislative Department Head Evelyn Dubrow, other union leaders, and covers issues such as diversity, worker strikes, working conditions, sweatshops including Kathy Lee Gifford interviews and pieces on Nike and Gap, Ann Hoffman on prison labor, NAFTA, and clothing imports.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UNITE Audio-Visual Collection #6000 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6000 MB: UNITE Memorabilia 6000/007 AV: UNITE Legislative Department Audio-Visual Materials 6000/012 AV: UNITE Northeast Department Audio-Visual Materials 6000/022 AV: UNITE Education Department Audio-Visual Materials 6000/024 AV: UNITE Local 23-25 Audio-Visual Materials 6000/026 AV: UNITE Office of Corporate and Financial Affairs Audio-Visual Materials 6000/037 AV: UNITE Communications Department Audio-Visual Materials 6000/050 AV: UNITE Local 10 and Local 23-25 Audio-Visual Materials 6000/056 AV: UNITE Boston Joint Board Audio-Visual Materials 6343 AV: Leonard Greenwald Collection of UNITE Audio-Visual Materials
